summary: Have you ever grown tired of those dull looking foxes that roam the landscapes of Skyrim? Well, then this vibrant and realistic retexture is for you!
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#808080\"][b]Hey! Slaythought here with my first Skyrim release! If you liked the mod, please support me by clicking that endorse button. Thank you![/b][/color]
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5010301-1349686214.png[/img]
[size=\"6\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Slaythought\'s Real Red Fox[/color][/size]
------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

Have you ever grown tired of those dull looking foxes that roam the landscapes of Skyrim? Well, I have, and that is why I made this retexture. This is a simple retexture that gives the fox a much more vibrant and realistic feel, hopefully turning it into a real Red Fox, an animal we all love. I did some research to get as close as possible to the real thing, and I\'m quite happy with the end result.

If you wish to use this texture for your own mod, ask for my permission first.
Hope you enjoy this retexture! Expect more mods from me in the future ;)

[i]-Slaythought[/i]
author: Slaythought
